Hey! Welcome!

This website was created to host Group 5's APS for the course 'R for Data Science' at Insper. 

Click on the button "APS" bellow to access the Initial Data Analysis.

In this project we conducted a Data Analysis Project using the Dataset <strong style="font-weight:bold;">Taxi Trips Chicago 2024</strong> that can be found at [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/adelanseur/taxi-trips-chicago-2024?resource=download).
